    #include<stdio.h>
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    long long a;
    char c;
    int count5=0;
    int count2=0;
    int mult=1;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
    mult=1;
     
    do
    {
    scanf("%lld", &a);
    if(a==0){printf("Robot hanged.\n");while(scanf("%c",&c) && c!='\n'); break;}
    while(a%5==0 && a!=0)
    {
    a=a/5;
    count5++;
    }
    while(a%2==0 && a!=0){
     
    a=a/2;
    count2++;
    }
    a=a%10;
    mult=mult*a;
    mult=mult%10;
     
    scanf("%c", &c);
    }while(c!='\n');
    if(count2>count5)
    {
    while(count2!=count5)
    {
     
    count2--;
    mult=mult*2;
    mult=mult%10;
    }
    }//if closed
    else
    {
    while(count5!=count2)
    {
     
    count5--;;
    mult=mult*5;
    mult=mult%10;
    }
    }//else closed
    if(a!=0)
    printf("%d\n", mult);
     
    }
    return 0;
    }
